text: what are the error messages you’re getting?

trying to download local hubl server
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/local-hubl-server>
but can not log-in
constantly kicked out
FYI the local hubl server is a bit outdated and hasn't been integrated with the CLI tools
if you still want to try using it, does the link at <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-hubl-server> work?
has anyone run into an issue with using `npx hs upload --mode=publish test.html test.html` and even though `mode` of *publish* is set, “make available in pages” defaults to OFF?

the more troubling part of that is, seemingly it uses this function under-the-hood to do the uploading <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-tools/blob/master/packages/cms-lib/api/fileMapper.js#L56> but that endpoint, `content/filemapper/v1/upload/:file` doesn’t appear to be documented. at all. so I can’t even try and figure out if maybe it was just implemented incorrectly
